title: Summer Is the Best - A Conversation With Colin
description:
Remember summer camp? Greg and Colin don't.

Today's topics were submitted by @ALEXFLANNAGAN. Leave your suggestions for future conversations in the comments below.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE/ BUY T-SHIRTS: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Every Tuesday and Thursday, roommates Greg and Colin sit down, and Greg throws a random conversation topic at Colin. In return, Colin usually says something crazy and you get a chuckle. Subscribe so you don't miss the madness.

Subscribe to our channel: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Follow us on Twitter
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/notaxation

#AConversationWithColin Playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL85130F65C312F61E&feature=plcp

Huge thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

transcript_chunks.text: It's difficult sometimes to work over the summer not in San Francisco because the summers suck here. What's up everybody? Welcome to A Conversation With Colin. I'm Greg, and this is my roommate Colin. Now sometimes Colin says crazy stuff. So every Tuesday and Thursday, I reach into my random topic pile, pull one out, toss it at him, and we talk it out for your amusement if you like that. Like the video, share it with your friends, and subscribe to us here on YouTube. Colin, are you ready? Guess today's topic is: Did you go to summer camp, and how was your experience? It was submitted by Alex Flannagan on Twitter. Did you ever go to summer camp? No. So what did you do during the summer? Hung out, yeah, yeah. You're well. Did you have a f... I didn't. Go to like a day camp summer camp thing right where it was like run through the Glen Park trails and WCC department or whatever, and you go there and like you draw and make crafts and crap like that, and you just go to the pool for like four hours. Yeah, I, I, I did something like that very briefly for like two months, uh, 1992 or '93, and I don't really remember it very well. Yeah, uh, I remember I hated it. Yeah, I didn't like the money and like that. I why was I here? Annoying counselors, annoying people, like annoying like 20-year-olds in charge. You're just like, "Get out of my face."
